column1: Card Game, Humor, Negotiation, Political, Science Fiction
Dice Rolling, Network and Route Building, Open Drafting, Tile Placement, Variable Player Powers

In this classic Steve Jackson (I) game of world domination, each player is a secret society attempting to spread its tendrils into special interest groups throughout the world.
